title: Game Progress Route
content:
lled "Middle-of-somewhere", and while he asks you to fill your plate, he also says this might be your last. Raphael will tranform into a devil and offers you a quick solution to your problem. you call him mad, Astarion, Lae'zel, and Shadowheart will approve. He's hoping you'd change your mind down the road. At the end, he will transport you back at the place where he showed up.

Speak to Andrick, Brynna, and Edowin

You will most likely come across the Forest after exploring the Emerald Grove. T
